description: It's less that it's cursed and more that it's just kind of dull.
Raises your attack but lowers your charisma. Recommended only for min-maxers with low self-esteem.
This sword loves to sing. Hope you like show tunes.
Anyone stabbed by this sword will fall in love with you. They will probably still die though.
Every previous owner of this sword perished in battle. Good birthday gift for somebody you hate?
For better or worse, you WILL grow a mullet.
Causes a deeply warped world view in the mind of its wielder. Comes with matching fedora.
A famous chef lived and died by this... literally.
